recipes.Title: Fried Pomfret
recipes.Instructions: Heat oil for 2 minutes. Fry fish in oil for 7 minutes per side. Take it out. Serve.

recipes.Title: Spam Fried Rice
recipes.Instructions: Grease wokpan with 1/2 tsp oil. Pour the egg into the pan to cook on both sides until the egg is set. Cut the egg to small squares when cooled. Set aside. Add and heat remaining oil to the existing wokpan. Add garlic. Add spam cubes. Stir-fry quickly until the spam is aromatic and starts to brown. Add mixed veg and cooked egg to the wok. Stir-fry for another 2 minutes. Serve.

recipes.Title: Shrimp Pasta
recipes.Instructions: In a pot of boiling water with 1 tsp salt added until al dente (usually minus 30 seconds off recommended time in packaging instructions for angel hair). Drain pasta. Reserve half a cup of pasta cooking water. Heat pan with olive oil and butter. Season shrimps with salt and black pepper, then arrange one layer on the pan. Allow one side to lightly sear before flipping over to the other side using kitchen tongs. When both sides of the shrimps are browned, turn off the heat. Add cooked pasta and avocado sauce to the pan of cooked shrimps. Toss to coat evenly, adding 1 or more tbsp pasta water to bind everything together. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.Title: Blueberry Overnight Oats Recipe
recipes.Instructions: In a glass jug, combine all ingredients, stir to mix well or cover with lid and shake vigorously. Chill in the fridge over night (or at least 6 hours) and keeps up to a week.

recipes.Title: Boiled Duck
recipes.Instructions: Boil duck in water for 20 minutes. Take it out. Serve.

recipes.Title: Tomato Egg Drop Soup
recipes.Instructions: In a pot, add diced tomato and water. Bring to a boil. Cover the pot with lid and simmer for 3 minutes. Thicken with cornstarch slurry until the soup thickens to your liking. Bring the soup to a boil again. Add in the beaten egg while stirring the soup in one circular direction around the pot. When the egg strands are set, season the soup to taste with salt and white pepper. While the soup is still piping hot, serve.

recipes.Title: Taiwanese Eggplant Salad
recipes.Instructions: Cook the eggplants using either the microwave, boiling or steaming method. Set aside. Combine the other ingredients in a small bowl. Mix well. Arrange cooked eggplant in a serving dish skin-side up and drizzle the sauce over.

recipes.Title: Steamed Sardines in Tomato Sauce
recipes.Instructions: Line a steaming dish with onions. Empty the can of sardines (including the tomato sauce) and add ketchup over the onions. Top with sliced chilli and tomato wedges. Steam the dish for 5-12 minutes, depending on how soft you like your cooked onions and tomatoes. To serve, stir with a spoon to evenly mix the sauce. Squeeze lime juice over the steamed sardines and serve.

Ingredients.Name: Onion,
Ingredients.Notes: cut to half moon thin slices

recipes.Title: 9-Layer Kueh
recipes.Instructions:
Boil the sugar and pandan leaves in a pot of water. Add a pinch of salt. Boil till the sugar dissolves completely.
Set aside to cool. Add the pandan leaves-sugar mixture to the flour mixture in a mixing bowl. Mix well. Sieve the coconut milk and add into the dough mixture. Mix well. Divide the mixture equally into 5 bowls. Add a different food colouring to each bowl. Brush a tray with oil that has been cooked with pandan leaves. Put the tray in a steamer. Steam each coloured layer for about 5 minutes, starting with the white layer and ending with the brightest colour.Remove the tray from the steamer and set aside to cool.Remove kueh from the tray and cut into serving portions. Serve.

recipes.Title: Air-Fried Crab Sticks
recipes.Instructions: Carefully peel and unroll the crab sticks, then separate to 1 cm width.Divide peeled crab sticks to two large plates, spray with cooking spray and use tongs to coat evenly. Preheat air fryer to 160°C (320°F) for 5 minutes. Add in one portion (one plate; 8 crab sticks or 125 grams) of peeled crab sticks in the basket. Cook for 4, 3 followed by 3 minutes. During each interval, pull out the basket and shake the contents for even cooking. If there are any pale coloured crab sticks at the end of 10 minutes, set them aside on a plate. After cooking all the crab sticks, you can cook this last batch of pale crab sticks for 2 more minutes and they will turn a uniform golden colour. When cooled, store crispy crab sticks in an air-tight container.
